products.title: Faux Suede Mercury Roman Blind
products.description: This classic grey roman blind has an attractive suede finish and will add a stylish and elegant feel to any room in your home. Our luxury side control chain headrail system allows quick and easy installation. Combine with contrasting curtains or simply use it on its own for a perfect crisp finish to your windows. Very much on trend, the mercury grey blind will bring a touch of luxury to your home at a fraction of the cost compared to high street prices.

products.title: Hopsack Mercury Roman Blind
products.description: One of their most popular blinds, the hopsack mercury roman blind is favoured by all. Simple with a rustic feel, the hopsack mercury blind is on point with current home fashion trends. Greys are most certainly in for todays contemporary home. This classic grey roman blind and its attractive textured finish, will add a stylish and elegant feel to any room in your home. Quality is important to us, and we want to make sure we offer you a luxury product at affordable prices, this is why all of their products go through a final quality check and comes complete with a five-year guarantee product id: db-rom0692 fabric colour: mercury material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. The faux suede mercury curtain in a lovely grey colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price.
